title: Customer Placing the Largest Number of Orders
description:
Write an SQL query to find the customer_number for the customer who has placed the largest number of orders.
The test cases are generated so that exactly one customer will have placed more orders than any other customer.

columns.name: customer_number
columns.description: Customer ID who placed the order

hints: Use COUNT(*) to count the number of orders per customer.
Use ORDER BY and LIMIT to get the customer with the most orders.
